description.value: Forbidden from venturing to the Sepres VI’s surface due both to the cultural taboo against doing so and the very real risks associated with it, seprevois—especially members and sympathizers of the Returners—created these handheld devices to remotely explore their planet’s surface. The surveyor features a small dish that transmits and receives a signal to the target, as well as a view screen and speaker that relay the device’s findings to you. The device allows you to employ both the audio and visual versions of @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.4Z6WeMM9uJ1U0wG6]{Clairaudience/Clairvoyance} simultaneously at a planetary range once per day, for a maximum duration of 10 minutes.
